statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.USE_YN DESC, AA.NAME) AS ROW_NO , AA.ID , AA.NAME , M1.NAME AS CUST_TYPE , AA.USE_YN FROM jwm.Customers AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwm.Business BZ WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BIZ_ID = BZ.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Codes M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CUST_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'CUST_TYPE' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.ID , AA.NAME , AA.CUST_TYPE , AA.EMAIL , AA.HPAGE , AA.USE_YN , AA.REMARKS
, AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
, AA.BIZ_ID , BZ.REG_NO AS BIZ_REG_NO , BZ.CORP_NO AS BIZ_CORP_NO , BZ.NAME AS BIZ_NAME , BZ.REP_NAME AS BIZ_REP_NAME , BZ.BIZ_TYPE AS BIZ_TYPE , BZ.BIZ_ITEM AS BIZ_ITEM
, BZ.ADDRESS_ID AS ADDRESS_ID , AD.POST_NO , AD.ZONE_NO , AD.ADDRESS1 , AD.ADDRESS2
FROM jwm.Customers AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwm.Business BZ WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BIZ_ID = BZ.ID LEFT JOIN jwm.Address AD WITH (NOLOCK) ON BZ.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwm.Customers ( NAME, CUST_TYPE, EMAIL, HPAGE, USE_YN, REMARKS, BIZ_ID, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #NAME#, #CUST_TYPE#, #EMAIL#, #HPAGE#, #USE_YN#, #REMARKS#, #BIZ_ID#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwm.Customers SET NAME = #NAME# , CUST_TYPE = #CUST_TYPE# , EMAIL = #EMAIL# , HPAGE = #HPAGE# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , BIZ_ID = #BIZ_ID# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
